ComicInfo.Title: The Debt
ComicInfo.Summary:
“The Debt: Finale”
In 1941, Lietuenant Bond finally learns the truth of his deceased mentor, Commander Weldon. But truth comes at a cost. The conclusion of Bond’s adventures in 1941, by JEFF PARKER (Aquaman, Fantastic Four) and IBRAHIM MOUSTAFA (James Bond: Solstice, Mother Panic).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Dan Panosian | 1 | B | Cover B | Dean Kotz (a) & Omi Remalante (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Vasco Georgiev | 3 | D | Cover D | Ibrahim Moustafa | 4 | E | Cover E | Bob Q | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Dan Panosian | 6 |
